enWisdom: The merchant puts himself at risk [of doing something that is forbidden]

Wisdom: لَنْ تُدْرِكَ مَا زُوِيَ عَنْكَ فَأَجْمِلْ فِي الْمُكْتَسَبِ
enWisdom: You will never attain that which has been taken away from you so be moderate in your acquisition

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَصْبِرْ عَلَى كَدِّهِ صَبَرَ عَلَى الْإِفْلَاسِ
enWisdom: One who is not patient in his toiling [for earning his livelihood] has to be patient in destitution
The gatherings of the marketplaces are the visiting places of Satan

Wisdom: لَا تُعَامِلْ مَنْ لَا تَقْدِرُ عَلَى الِانْتِصَافِ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: Do not make any dealings with one from whom you have no power to demand justice
